name: Daseco Electrical
overview:
DASECO Electrical LLC, located on Martha’s Vineyard in Massachusetts, offers customers a full range of electrical services in both commercial and residential settings. The company is available for wiring and lighting of new construction, renovations, and additions plus electrical system upgrades. The fully licensed technicians at DASECO Electrical can also assist in installing environmentally friendly solar electrical systems, home theater and technology components, and even security features like home alarms or smoke and carbon monoxide detectors. For island residents, the company will also assist with hook-up of back-up generators.

Available to work with home and business owners as well as general contractors, DASECO Electrical prides itself on offering the same commitment to quality to all. Their service guarantee promises all jobs will be code-compliant, on time, and within budget. In addition, DASECO offers flexible scheduling to allow clients to adjust based on the requirements and schedules of other contractors.

Competitive pricing and outstanding customer service stand as part of the company’s commitment to serving Vineyard residents. Residents of Southeastern Massachusetts and Cape Cod can also benefit from the great service at DASECO Electrical through locations on Nantucket and Cataumet.
